name: jut
description:
A game about beach hunting

Help a trash monster complete its checklist. Transport trash in your belly or on your head, and throw it away to make more items wash up. More things wash up while the game is closed. Find all the different items to complete the game!

  • 15+ items to collect
  • checklist to see what you collected
  • wear a stack of trash hats
  • ~20 minutes of play time (a couple of hours (over time) to find everything)

Controls

  • walk: move the mouse
  • pick up: LMB and RMB
  • explode: hold both LMB and RMB
  • pause menu: escape


Sokpop makes a new game every two weeks!
